comment:
lol, and now we know where Amber got her NPD from... the parents.

Edit: Let me give a piece of advice that may be the most important you'll ever hear: NEVER DELETE YOUR TEXTS. EVER. Trust me when I tell you its evidence you will need in the event someone tries to smear you. Don't think you're doing something noble or helpful, because before you know it that someone you're trying to protect will gladly stick a knife, or sword, in your back (and likely come out the front of you). If they ask you to delete texts its a red flag you've got something thats damaging to their credibility; again, don't delete your texts, keep them, they may be the only thing that can will keep you from getting hurt.

comment:
The judge ruled Johnny Depp assaulted Amber Heard on 12 different occasions and put her in actual fear for her very life on 3 different occasions. In a court of law he IS considered a wife beater and the Sun is perfectly in the right to call him so. 

Our dude is greasy. He needs to take a gd shower and go to rehab before he dies from $30k a month worth of wine, pills, ecstacy and cocaine. He "seems awkward in public" because he's intoxicated. Drugged and drunk to the very extent to which the human body can withstand. You'd be awkward too if you had, "been awake 3 days snorting powder, pills, wine, 2 bottles of champers on the plane..", probably the same plane he admits to attempting to "playfully tap" kick Amber on the ass during an argument as she was walking away. 

Can you imagine if your husband tried to kick you during an argument as you were walking away?! The witnesses to the event said that Amber continued to walk off crying. If that was me I would have wrecked that entire plane into the ground to get to his wasted ass if my husband was as disrespctful of me, his life partner, as JD was of his wife and life partner, AH. 

All these JD ass kissing videos with lies about amber and the case clickbait that I've watched never bring up the fact that Amber only started recording the things he did because the next day when she had to tell him what he did and said and how much it sucked for her when he was black out wasted, he couldn't remember anything! 

There's probably a reason JD couldn't get Vanessa to marry him. He's a disaster, a walking drug overdose. The last person that can be a good husband. Ladies that have been in a marriage with someone that was constantly drunk and drugged, was it a decent marriage? Was he a decent, competent husband or was he very sick, toxic to his marriage and to you, and need psychiatric care? Did you feel more like a babysitter than a wife? JD needs to go straight from the courtroom to his room in a rehab in my opinion, and I'm sure many psychiatrist's opinions are well.

Smfh...."$30k a month on 'wine'". Btw, to deny to himself how big a problem he has, he claims the wines he buys are "investments". His accountants counter that, "it's not an investment if you drink it as soon as you buy it." ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è He's really gone downhill. I know he was always a drug addict and an alcoholic, but now that he's 60 it's really starting to show. I don't think he's gonna live much longer abusing drugs and alcohol to the extent he does...he's pushing 60 partying like a 24 year old. 

Shame. HUGE shame, he is one of my favorite actors and I don't believe in enabling and letting people remain in denial about their substance abuse disorder until it kills them. Why doesn't Vanessa and or his daughter and son stage an intervention for their Father, or the father of their children??! Will he rough them up too if they said something like what he did to A when she tried to intervene? Ignoring this will not make this go away, but it will make him go away. Forever. This is how people die. He needs to address this issue. His family needs to take him for a 9 month in patient stay at Betty Ford. No more going to the Bahamas to his private island to "dry out" he needs to be in an actual rehab that uses intensive therapy all day and mental health medication, therefore he has to have doctors and he needs to stay inpatient for at least 6 to 9 months. No jumping over the fence after less than a day and going home and doing an huge shot to the arm and then a shot in the head like kurt. We've seen this happen to all of our heroes. We cant let it happen AGAIN to JD!

comment: I'm literally sobbing. My dad raped, beat and emotionally terrified me as a little girl, I've gone through 2 relationships that I've had to find the strength that took years on each one to leave. I left my job, my home, just had the clothes on my back. Then when it came to my girls, they were my strength. I would do anything to have a man love me like he loved her. I'm permanently disabled, scarred both physically and emotionally. I live at home and don't leave. I've cut myself off. My girls are the reason I breathe and I pine, really pine for someone to just love me, just me, that's all. Nobody will want someone like me with no money and no job. I've nothing to offer and I don't blame them. I'm 42 now and eternally alone in the sense of other than my children. This woman had so much and just damaged it, broke it, stamped on it and threw it away. I would do virtually anything if it meant someone could love me like that. Men and women go through this and darn't speak up because of people like her. I pray she never feels the icy loneliness I will forever feel and never have.

comment:
You can just instantly tell this was based around money and her wanting to build her career platform. 

JD is a wonderful man who deserves so much in this world! Especially after having his name and character tainted to be something he is most definitely not! JD is one of the most passionate, down to earth, loving and most considerate person that we have the pleasure of knowing and supporting.

I can tell you in a heartbeat this woman‚Äôs intentions were never based around love or to build a beautiful marriage and relationship with JD. AH simply targeted a worldwide sensational actor to help her build her financial status and her career within the acting industry. AH is a disgusting, compulsive lying brat who seriously had the AUDACITY to try and act as a voice for thousands of women in the industry who are actually experiencing horrible forms of abuse. 

She seriously tried to make up a whole FAKE scenario and story in her head to try and build her name in the industry as someone who spoke out against ‚Äúabuse‚Äù from a extremely well known actor?!  

Someone please help the world gain some acknowledgment as to what this vile woman‚Äôs intentions are! People like AH who throw around fake abuse accusations where she is being proved to be lying on multiple occasions honestly make me sick. There are women and men who seriously go through different forms of abuse!!!

AH is also using her gender to try and back up these claims because she‚Äôs a ‚Äòwoman‚Äô and JD is a man so no one will believe him. 

God let this woman get what she deserves and may she never get off this scandal lightly!

Her parents were in on it. She plainly told them to stop trying to get him back and that they would move on to the next plan. comment: When considering all the motions filed by her legal team, the most disturbing is the motion they filed in CA state court against Twitter. Apparently Ms. Heard was upset that people were supporting Johnny Depp on Twitter and according to her lawyers "Ms. Heard is convinced those same people are speaking against her in private messages to Johnny Deep". The motion demanded that Twitter provide the names, emails and any relevant information of those speaking ill of Ms. Heard to include address and phone numbers. When Heard, who was present when the motion went before the court, was asked by the Judge what she would do with the information from twitter if she got it.....her response? "Your Honor, that's my private business". So, people who speak to Johnny Depp in private and have a legal expectation of privacy, according to Heard that legal expectation doesn't apply when she is subject. Her right to privacy however isn't even suitable for a judge to hear.

comment: Be under no illusion- these kinds of circumstances, where violent & abusive ex-wives claim the other party an abuser to deflect from their own malfeasance, are becoming EXCEPTIONALLY common, especially in the UK. Venal divorce lawyers are continually urging new clients to allege abuse to discredit their ex-spouse in financial negotiations. It is a pandemic of amorality. For too long, genuinely abused women went unheard and uncared for, but society needs to wake up to the viciousness of ‚Äòfamily law‚Äô, and recognize that it‚Äôs an industry which thrives on peddling lies and misery.

comment:
What's even more amazing: She claimed the bodyguards witnessed his violence, and had even been attacked by him, had even spoken FOR them. Well, that backfired on her when the bodyguards in question, were actually questioned about the incident they witnessed. Guess what, they were on Depp's side, and claimed Amber as being violent and a liar

What I don't get, is how Depp's side can have so many credible witnesses from so many different parts of the abuse, majority of whom don't even know each other, yet she claims a few bouts of abuse from him, with barely any witnesses, and barely any evidence, and yet is still seen as the victim.

This is why the court systems around the globe need to change. We're in a time where lying about someone to get either money, or to get away from the guilt they have from giving consent on one night of sex, is rampant, where many men are being ruined by the word of one woman. Wouldn't be surprised if my ex, right now, was making up similar fantastical stories about me, as she was very much like Amber Turd. Keep fighting a good fight Johny, show the world that manipulative women can no longer get away with false accusations. Do it for us men, and more importantly, the fathers out there with a similar branding thanks to their abusive ex. If such a high profile actor can achieve this goal, it will be one huge step for men everywhere who fear for their stability in life.

Johnny has continued to act as a decent person...while Amber has done everything in her power to destroy him. I truly believe that she set her sights on him...for one purpose...to take him for everything that she could get.

I also find it funny that even though Amber had originally filed for Alimony, 3 of Johnny's penthouse condo's, furniture, artwork, and more...she has basically dropped the suits asking for all of his properties...and took some sort of cash buy0out...which was 1/10th of her original demand.  Without a prenup...she could have gotten half of everything...

Has anyone investigated the money-managers...to see if Amber had made cucks out of them too.  Did someone steal all of his money specifically for her?  She is a human leech...and this really needs to be investigated. comment:
Regarding the Poop-gate incident:
1. She blames the dogs
2: She tells a manager that it was a practical joke
3: Gasligthing JD, claiming it never happened (JD contacts the manager in AH's presence and asks to repeat what he had told JD, AH gets angry and says he lies)
4: Gaslighting the cleaning lady, claiming it never happened (despite the photo evidence)
5: Then says it either did not happen or JD did it....

Okay, hear me out, I was reading the court transcript & when Johnny joked with Stephen Deuters via text about doing a poo on the floor so Amber would step in it, it strikes me odd that that ended up happening in real life before Coachella. This and the messages between Johnny & David Heard being seen by Amber really makes me wonder if she was secretly logged into Johnny‚Äôs iCloud. 
I mean, there‚Äôs a small chance she still could be logged in, but something just doesn‚Äôt add up, well, everything with her claims don‚Äôt add up, but that in particular struck me as very peculiar, almost as if Amber thought ‚Äùoh they wanna joke about doing that and me stepping in it, okay, I‚Äôll do it to him and he can lie in it‚Äù. It‚Äôs not exactly difficult to imagine her doing such a thing. But I hope Johnny has made sure and even checked that no one was or is logged into his iCloud (or whatever it‚Äôs called for different phones) other than him, I wouldn‚Äôt put anything past her.

comment:
Her parents may really care for Johnny, but they are in complete denial about her mental state. I don't know if they are "just as evil as Amber" as a lot of people are saying. I realize, they could be, but they could also just be human and trying to do what's best for their daughter and still have a decent relationship with Johnny. 
There is every chance they just didn't think about the restraining order or misspoke and meant they wished they could have talked things out before the restraining order. I mean, they could be down to earth, in denial, and a little naive. Not saying that is for sure the case. But so far I have watched up to 18:56 of this video and I think that is a possibility. Not everyone plots like that, thinks that far ahead. Some, maybe most people take things one step at a time, and as humans we make mistakes and say stupid things that aren't always true to how we feel.

Ahh... the end, the fact they threatened to kill him after all of that. Got it. Still, since there is so much apparent gossip on both sides, there could have been more to that. Easy answer looks like money. But it could just as easily be something else that was said or done that was not revealed yet.

comment:
I hope that, if it is proven that she lied, both she and also her friends are taken to task for perpetuating such a story, and destroying Johnny's reputation.  If not, it just seems that a woman could say ANYTHING and get away with it, whereas a man is taken to task before even being proven guilty.
This is not the message that those who really want women's rights is trying to send, and does absolutely nothing to help those who genuinely suffer, or have suffered, abuse.
Could something good come from that?  Hopefully, that it allows male victims of abuse can now come forward without being ridiculed, though from the press reaction and the texts you showed in one of your earlier videos, probably not.
SO, while we are crying out for female/gay/minority rights, can we also cry out for the rights of the men who feel that, to come out and say what they need to say, they will just face ridicule and disbelief, please?  It IS equality we are asking for, is it not?
Take Care and Stay Safe, Everyone. xxx

     NO CONTACT Means NO CONTACT between ANY parties, whatsoever! ! ! NO third person contact! ! ! No text messages, no phone calls, no emails at ALL! ! ! In other words the parents, family, friends cannot speak too or on behalf of the restraining order! ! !

author: itsme Emma

comment:
Jesus she needs serious help. I have Borderline Personality Disorder and in my early 20‚Äôs before my treatment I could have easily acted in a similar way to this, in fact I kinda did.... I didn‚Äôt go THIS far but I did act on my emotions from minute to minute. I could loose control. I caused awful rows with the chap I was with at the time, constantly accusing HIM of cheating when I was the one that went on to cheat. I would shout and scream and throw things and tell him to fuck off and get out of the house yet the minute he went to leave I‚Äôd tell him I loved him and beg him to stay only to start arguing again. I never physically abused that man but when experiencing a deep rage I could have.

I‚Äôm not diagnosing Amber and I‚Äôm not proud of myself for who I was back then, however, Amber does exhibit some of the traits of a mood/unstable personality disorder. Underneath it all people who have these types of disorders aren‚Äôt inherently bad but they really DO need treatment. Unfortunately it doesn‚Äôt respond to medication and it takes YEARS of therapy which is only effective IF the patient really wants it and is capable of working hard with a mental health team. 
For an actress, they can‚Äôt take that time out of their career because of the shelf life they have in Hollywood so many with personality disorders won‚Äôt seek treatment & will continue to wreak havoc in relationships, cause chaos in their own and everyone else‚Äôs lives and will be difficult to work on set with if they are having a bad day.

I‚Äôm in NO way sticking up for Amber, I think what she has done and continues to do is deplorable. She found a man that loved her deeply and she abused him. She should be court ordered to a mental health facility at the very least and be made to confront her actions in all their horrific glory. 
She should be given boundaries and shown that if she wants to continue to work she mustn‚Äôt behave like this with people, and I say people because Amber has abused multiple partners. 

I feel sympathy for those that have had to deal with Ms. Heard. She is a terrible friend and a terrifying girlfriend/wife. 
I fear Hollywood enables this kind of thing as long as it gets what it wants out of it. 
This is NOT how people behave. In any other workplace it would not be tolerated and you‚Äôd be made to confront yourself much sooner.

The media love salacious gossip so the person that leaks the story first appears to win, at first. Johnny tried so hard to protect her from any bad publicity but she stuck the knife in and twisted it to fit her narrative. She may be wrapped up in a pretty bow but a snake is a snake no matter the pretty package. I hope people start to see her for what she really is.

comment:
Amber knew damn well she had Johnny by the closet and that he was in love with her, but she still went to the lawyers, using the false excuse of ‚Äúlosing the penthouse.
Nothing is Amber‚Äôs fault, it‚Äôs the lawyer‚Äôs fault, says the parents. 
This covering up was likely a pattern, that was nothing was ever Amber‚Äôs fault.
She claims her daughter‚Äôs violent love was ‚ÄúPerfect.‚Äú
This myth of Amber‚Äôs innocence, this denial likely contributed to the actress‚Äô narcissism.
Narcissism does not come out of a vacuum.
Her father clearly has a sense of entitlement, which is a symptom of narcissism.
His anger and exploitative entitlement of wanting a percentage to ‚ÄúProduce a film,‚Äù shows further narcissism.
That the guy is exploiting his daughter‚Äôs husband to try to get into the film business (more narcissism), and that he claims is lack of ability to get into the motion picture business is Johnny‚Äôs fault (never mind his having no background in film, nothing is the fault of a narcissist), indicate narcissism.
Amber‚Äôs quote to the effect of being taken aback that her father only hit the guy once, shows shared  entitlement.
It sounds like the mother was the enabler, and the father or Amber was either the primary narcissist in the family.
I studied a ton of psychology, and I can tell you that narcissism is like an addiction. 
The narcissistic supply has to constantly be fed.
We know that needing to associate with celebrities is another criteria of narcissism.
The feeling of entitlement of the affairs she had, starting a month into her marriage, and much more here leads to a very disturbed pattern of behavior in Amber and her father, known as narcissistic personality disorder..
Johnnie tried to reason with her to make it go away, but those persistent feelings of being the one and only important person in the room rarely go away.
She clearly didn‚Äôt love Johnny enough to go to therapy, and I‚Äôm sure she knows she has a huge problem.
It is sad to hear Johnny say, ‚Äúshe may never recover,‚Äù as if she is a victim of them, and to heR him say, ‚ÄúHer friends are leading her down an evil path.‚Äù
He is in total denial hear that is AMBER is the one that is talking everybody into the hoax.
He is in so much pain, he still can‚Äôt face the fully truth that it is Amber wanting everyone to do all of this evil hoax.
Amber has decimated Johnny‚Äôs self-esteem so greatly, that he feels like a failure, saying, ‚ÄúAll I wanted to do was make her smile,‚Äù or something to that effect.
This is common in abuse victims. 
They believe the failure of the relationship is their failing, rather than face that their partner, who is evil and disturbed.
Amber‚Äôs parents here are in denial to Johnny that her decisions and actions are her fault.
In this conversation, Johnny goes in and out of denial.

comment:
*I'd like to note here the incident with Heard and the Mechanic in the car ("we're all alone here, and could anything we want, and nobody would know").*


*One of the sentinel attributes associated with BPD is extreme promiscuity, and the use of promiscuity for manipulation of those around them.  This tiny snippet reaffirms my belief that Amber Heard has Borderline Personality Disorder, a condition which is essentially psychiatric based criminality.  Obviously, a formal diagnosis is impossible without an in-person examination, and therefore my assessment is one made solely as an opinion, not a medical diagnosis.  That said, I have close to zero doubt that after formal diagnostics and examination, I would be diagnosing Borderline Personality Disorder, along with several comorbidities.*


*BPD'ers are - intentionally or not (using "intentionally" in the psychiatric sense), extreme abusers of those around them - **_all of the people around them,_** whether they are close personal relationships or near strangers.  To a BPD'er, the world is what they make it, at the **_moment_** they make it, and is subject to change at any time, as many times as is perceived as necessary, with the actual truth of any matter being **_completely_** immaterial.  BPD'ers leave long trails of broken relationships and people behind them as they manipulate every person and situation to maximize the perception  of the BPD'er as a victim of the world around them.  They are the perpetual victims of every person they have ever met, and because of this intense manipulation, it becomes pretty much impossible to maintain long term relationships - most people will not stick around very long after having been exposed to the "Gone Girl" phenomenon of BPD.  Especially after they themselves become one of the "abusers" in the BPD'ers never ending carousel of abuse stories.*


*Until **_very_** recently, Borderline Personality Disorder was considered to be **_absolutely untreatable,_** due primarily to the BPD need for continuous and very public victimhood.  With the creation of Cognitive Behavioural Therapy ("CBT") and Schema Therapy ("ST"), BPD is still seen as incurable, however in a very tiny subset of BPD'ers, CBT and ST can be successfully used to minimize the condition to an extent where it **_may_** be possible for the BPD'er to become marginally functional.  A disorder which demands victimhood at the hands of every person interacted with is, by definition, going to be difficult (if at all possible) to treat in any meaningful way, as it models the BPD'ers personal environment so that **_every_** person, company, stranger, and even animal, is an active threat, and in order to maintain that threat/victimhood model, every means at the BPD'ers disposal is considered an available and appropriate tool (from total fabrications to the more common twisting of benign events into articles of active abuse at the hands of the evil abuser (the entity on the opposite side of the interaction).  Because this condition is driven by the need for victimhood, it is necessary for the BPD'er to manipulate at least some of their "audience" into being the "sympathetic support" structure upon which the BPD shitshow can be forst projected for sympathy, and secondarily used as a reinforcement tool later on (as in people have no reason to think that they are being told utter fabrications of negative circumstances and events for the sole purpose of eliciting sympathetic responses - at least not until their role is altered from the sympathetic supporter to the role of betrayer and unexpected pile-on abuser).*


*BPD is a disorder that does far more damage to the people who are unfortunate enough to encounter the BPD'er socially (often leading to romantically, as part of the regular pathology of BPD), than damage to the BPD'er themselves.  This sets up a never ending cycle of destruction of those around the BPD'er that inevitably leads to true rejection and subsequent reinforcement of the victimhood delusion which is the basis for the BPD phenomenon.*

I never believed the domestic violence allegations Amber made against Johnny.  He has had fairly public relationships in the past and I've never heard *one* charge of domestic violence against him.      The problem is most L.E. has a hard time believing men when they claim their female partners have been physically abusive while when a woman cries abuse against a man, they are usually believed right off the bat.

author: tessamersus

comment:
I really want to thank you for making these videos. Back when Amber's original abuse allegations against Johnny came out, I was going through a really rough time and just didn't even bother getting to know the situation. I just had the vague idea that Johnny Depp, who was one of the only actors I actually knew by name, was labeled an abuser and I left it at that without deciding my feelings on it. Sometime last year I came across a Tumblr post that said he was the victim, but again I was going through a hard time and didn't search into the case, instead remaining neutral. But when I saw the hashtag trending yesterday and listened to some of the audio clips, I was disgusted and knew that I couldn't sit idly by without informing myself on the topic better so I could truly champion for whoever was the victim- And your videos have been an extremely informative and eye-opening source of information. Now that I've armed myself with facts and evidence, I can easily say I know Johnny Depp was the victim and I want to see justice. I want Amber Heard punished- No abusers should escape, especially with just how much she put Johnny Depp through.
Again, thank you for taking the time to make these videos. I'm glad there have been people fighting for him.

comment: If anything is to be taken from this, it is that an accusation is NOT proof of wrong doing and that we should not rush to judgement. That is why movements like "just believe her" are so scary as they want us to AUTOMATICALLY  believe someone is guilty JUST because the accuser is female. But there IS a reason why the presumption of innocence exists in law, and though there are real female victims of abuse out there, to suggest that a woman would NEVER maliciously lie about something like this is just absurd. It's good to see that the truth is coming out in Johnny's case, it must have been a nightmare for him.

comment: The motion was filed in VA, USA.  Courts in the USA are open forum--they are in the public's interest and criminal cases are ALWAYS on behalf of the people.  Courts in the USA tend to allow sealing documents from public view when they involve children.  Personal data can be sealed as well.  But anything that is a public procedure (including most divorce actions) is readily available to anyone who has an interest.

Having said that I will say that the reason Amber's side is continually dragging ass on this case and not submitting information or challenging every witness is that's standard procedure for the defense.  They are never going to make it easy to proceed because the more challenging and longer it drags on the more momentum it loses the more likely the case will get dismissed. author: Eliane Albert

comment:
When you gotta get up for the first day back to class in an hour but you've spent all night watching videos proving the innocence of a celebrity you barely care about. 

But fr dude these videos are like crack, there's nothing better than people systematically disproving the harmful statements of liars with research and fact. Even if I don't care about Depp all that much, he deserves to be defended. A reoccurring issue I see in a lot of these cases of questionable allegations that I feel isn't considered enough (by cancel culture obsessed keyboard warriors and the wellmeaning sympathetic folks alike) is to question what the accuser stands to gain by going public. Reliving trauma is a difficult thing, and making it so publicized opens you up to a lot of harassment and abuse, so I would assume that a person would have a very good motive to have the strength to subject themselves to that. Especially since Ambers created her own little metoo circus, she's a very public figure BECAUSE of these allegations and thus even more open to public ridicule. The reason given for blowing up these situations is usually to put the abusers name out there so no other people are victimized, but Amber has done a whole lot more than just that. Her trauma is the source of her fame, and it's hard for me to believe that someone who has suffered the way she claims to have suffered would so easily be able to flip their severely damaging experiences around as a status symbol. And that's without mentioning the monetary gain and assets she was obviously so desperate for. I'd love to be able to openly accept all abuse victims, but when the movement of acceptance becomes a platform for easy celebrity and money at the expense of other people, I feel that everyone could stand to give the situation some critical thought before bandwagoning and making martyrs out of monsters.

Anyway, greats videos. 10/10 would not sleep again.

I can't speak for this woman or her father, but when it comes to the "what father would?" questions, I'm afraid to say my father would.
I was abused and terrified over a four month period, only ending when I tricked my partner out of our home. My father said he didn't want to hear about it, cause it was "our business".  Eighteen months later, when my mother died, I get a sympathy card from guess who? My stalker and former partner. Yes, Dad stayed in touch and passed on the info - about a woman he'd long divorced, btw.
I'm just saying - family ain't always reliable. This is why my family largely comprises people I have come to know and trust over time.

comment: During a messy breakup/ divorce a narcissist will threaten suicide in order to bait the victim into coming back! I‚Äôve educated myself in narcissistic abuse because of what I‚Äôve gone through in my life as I had no idea there was a term for how I was abused. This type does all the same things: idealize, love bomb, abuse emotionally, financially, physically, mentally, gaslighting, projecting, deflection, then discard. The victim is left confused, sad, broken while the narcissist has already begun a smear campaign so the victim is isolated and doesn‚Äôt understand what happened. Later when the narcissist is lacking supply, they do something called ‚Äúhoovering‚Äù, which means out of the blue the victim will receive some form of contact from the narcissist. This is done to suck the victim back in to continue the abuse cycle. The only way to escape the narcissist‚Äôs game is to go full no contact, there is no closure, only what the victim decides to give themselves through healing. I‚Äôve always believed Johnny Depp, really hope that he receives the justice he deserves as well as his reputation restored. üôè‚ù§Ô∏è

author: Alex

comment:
Wow!  


I'm in Australia living through the fires that are sweeping across our nation; smoke hazed out and woke this morning, discovered your post in my YouTube feed.  Needing much required diversion and something I thought I could play in the background whilst coffee making and such, I clicked on your thumbnail.  Very interesting.  


I'm not a Johnny Depp fan particularly but I recall the incident we had here in Oz with her dogs; whatever the truth is between these two, I hope it manages to drift into the open.


It seems like you do a heap of work/research, thank you for an interesting upload - it was sufficiently compelling I didn't once look out the window to lament the white-out smoke haze plaguing us these past few days/weeks.  I live in Melbourne, Victoria's capital city and yesterday was the first day the smoke from the fires was so intense it drifted into and whited out the metropolitan/CBD area.


Really, really bad - very strong aroma of acrid smoke.  


I live on the 19th level of a tower and look out over the city, it was truly disturbing to see nothing but white smoke.  Your upload took my mind away albeit for a few minutes, to somewhere I wasn't reminded our environment is in serious trouble, species being wiped out - including precious bees - the Amber and Johnny lament was a welcome momentary distraction from more important happenings.

comment:
Amber Heard is the perfect Narcissistic Abuser herself.. She‚Äôs pulling the classic ‚Äúprojection,‚Äù card. Blaming him, FIRST, for her very own crimes. That‚Äôs what my ex husband is still doing to me, to this very day. One of his incidents, could‚Äôve sent me to prison for attempted murder.. Ironically, only one of us left that situation with bruises and handprints from head to toe. Yet, to this very day, when he talks about that incident, his story is ‚ÄúHe was trying to kill himself.‚Äù 
But I was the only one left beaten. 
That‚Äôs what they do. It‚Äôs a cat and mouse game of flipped tales, between who is the perpetrator, and who‚Äôs the actual victim. Because whoever runs to tell the story ‚Äúfirst,‚Äù is typically the one who‚Äôs believed. So when the actual victim stands up and is outraged, it makes them look like they‚Äôre the deranged violent person they‚Äôre made out to be... My heart goes out to him. I knew he didn‚Äôt do what she accused him of. I‚Äôm so glad the truth is finally coming out. 
Luckily for him, he has money and can deal with this. I‚Äôm still fighting off my abuser as we speak. We‚Äôve been separated since 2013 and he‚Äôs STILL stalking my ass. I recently even had to get an Order of Protection against him, for this very reason. The slander never stops. The systematic dismantling of the other persons life, reputation, and character, never stops. It‚Äôs a complete and utter shit show. And these people get away with it. Eerily enough, I‚Äôve awoken at 5:50 this morning to find my ex‚Äôs vehicle parked just a few buildings down from my house. Even with a damn OOP... These people don‚Äôt care. About anyone or anything, but themselves.

comment:
I watched only a few minutes of this video and I had to stop as this is too painful to watch. I'm a big fan of Johnny and have been supporting him since the beginning. I remember when this whole shit began,  a lot of people and Amber's followers used to call Johnny a wife beater and a violent man. A lot of people and Amber's followers were wondering why Johnny was still employed and why people would go at the theatre to see a wife beater. Later, Johnny appeared in the first movie of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find them. Amber's followers threatened to boycott the second movie. His reputation was destroyed because he was seen as a wife beater, because he is a man and men "are always the abuser when there is a toxic relationship in a couple".

Now it looks like the wind is changing direction. It is revealed that the abuser in this case is not who many believed it was but that he is in fact the victim. People are beginning to open their eyes. People are beginning to realise that the so-called victim is in fact a monster, a violent woman who has already been charged for abusing at least one of her ex girlfriends. People are beginning to believe the real victim who was probably afraid to step forward because these same people were judging him without any proofs that he has done something to his monster.

Johnny is strong.  Yes, he continued to be employed and continued to move forward in his life and career because he knew that he was innocent and he was smart enough to choose the appropriate moment to tell the world what he has been going through with that monster.

Johnny, I believe you and I support you.  Always have, always will.  #Johnnyisinnocent #mentoo #justiceforjohnny

comment:
In my opinion, the reason why Amber's parents were persistent in trying to get Johnny to contact Amber was because the case can get dismissed if the restraining order is broken. It honestly sounds like they were trying to manipulate Johnny into dropping the charges by making him feel, and believe they were on his side. Also, by continuing to tell Johnny to delete their conversations they were trying to get rid of evidence. Now I'm not exactly sure if that would be considered as "tampering with evidence", but isn't it "tampering with evidence" if a case was being investigated and someone got rid of anything that could potentially be useful to the investigation??

*Everything is in this comment is alleged, and my own personal opinion.*

author: Gianna Giorgio

comment: Thank you for all your hard work! Insightful as always! I am grateful there is someone like you, Brian... out here willing to put out the unbiased facts, the actual court information and context to this whole situation. It's clear the media has no intention of doing their job and reporting fairly about this. They picked the wrong side from the beginning and they aren't willing to admit that they helped and are still helping a lying abuser. These text messages are truly heartbreaking to read.üíî You can tell how deeply in love Johnny was with Amber. Even though, she had abused him and treated him like shit throughout their marriage, he was still hurt and shocked that she would falsely accuse him of something so outside of his character. You can actual read his despair as he realizes that the person he thought he fell in love with actually never did exist. He had been used and manipulated by Amber from day one and still he held on to his love for her until the end...so sad. The amount of strength, honor and integrity in Johnny Depp's character is admirable. All these years he had this information that would exonerate him of the charges ScAmber made against him, but he kept these texts to himself to protect the abuser he loved and her family. Because he was a decent guy and would not hurt them no matter what they had done to him. How very, very wrong the media and public was about him! It's tragic how such a honorable and genuine soul as Johnny Depp got painted like a monster over money and lies. And, still with this new evidence there is an unjust bias in the media against him. What Amber and her family did to Johnny is shameful and disgusting! What the mass media and cancel culture did Johnny Depp is also shameful and disgusting! I don't know how anyone could continue to support an obvious abuser and hoaxer like Amber Heard after seeing this evidence. It's time the world give a collective apology to Johnny Depp, he never deserved the hate that was thrown at him. He has been put through the ringer these past few years for things he never did. It's time to expose Amber Heard for the liar and abuser she is once and for all! She's the one who needs to be cancelled and jailed! I wish Johnny Depp happiness, peace and justice in 2020...good heavens, after all he's been through, no one deserves it more!
